name: Peter Thiel
subtitle: Contrarian monopoly hunter
description: Looks for non-obvious truths and asymmetric outcomes.

name: Marc Andreessen
subtitle: Platform and software expansion
description: Prioritizes markets where software can redraw the value chain.

name: Bill Gurley
subtitle: Marketplace and unit economics
description: Tests whether growth quality survives under realistic assumptions.

name: Elad Gil
subtitle: Execution-first operator lens
description: Focuses on speed, market timing, and pragmatic go-to-market leverage.

name: Fred Wilson
subtitle: Community and network effects
description: Evaluates whether user behavior compounds into durable defensibility.

name: Arjun Sethi
subtitle: Data integrity watchdog
description: Demands evidence in retention, conversion, and cohort durability.

name: Reid Hoffman
subtitle: Strategic blitzscaling
description: Assesses when speed creates irreversible category leadership.

name: Sam Altman
subtitle: Category-defining ambition
description: Rewards bold technical bets with long-term societal upside.

name: Garry Tan
subtitle: Underdog conviction
description: Finds founder-market fit in overlooked, anti-consensus spaces.

name: Naval Ravikant
subtitle: Compounding leverage
description: Frames outcomes through leverage, optionality, and specific knowledge.

name: Paul Graham
subtitle: Founder craftsmanship
description: Looks for builder intensity and authentic problem obsession.

name: Clayton Christensen
subtitle: Disruption diagnostics
description: Tests jobs-to-be-done and entrant pathways from underserved segments.

name: Elon Musk
subtitle: First-principles pressure test
description: Rebuilds assumptions from fundamentals and physics constraints.

name: Thales Teixeira
subtitle: Customer-value-chain decoupling
description: Analyzes where customer value is being unbundled and recaptured.

name: Vinod Khosla
subtitle: High-variance frontier bets
description: Accepts failure distribution in exchange for transformational upside.

name: Michael Moritz
subtitle: Narrative and founder endurance
description: Looks for resilient founders who can execute through volatility.

name: Kirsten Green
subtitle: Consumer behavior signaler
description: Examines cultural pull, repeat behavior, and brand elasticity.

name: Steve Jurvetson
subtitle: Future-tech pattern matcher
description: Searches for step-change technologies with nonlinear adoption curves.

name: Arthur Rock
subtitle: Character-first conviction
description: Weights founder integrity and judgment as primary decision criteria.

name: Don Valentine
subtitle: Market-size realism
description: Starts with demand magnitude and monetization potential.
